favourite.title: Ariel
favourite.overview: A Finnish man goes to the city to find a job after the mine where he worked is closed and his father commits suicide.
favourite.cast: Merja Pulkkinen, Eetu Hilkamo, Turo Pajala, Esko Salminen, Sami Lanki, Sirkka Rautiainen, Hannu Kivisalo, Tomi Salmela, Mikko Remes, Heikki Salomaa, Veikko Uusimäki, Kari Helaseppä, Timo Markko, Pekka Wilen, Kauko Laalo, Mikko Lyytikäinen, Matti Jaaranen, Esko Nikkari, Timo Harakka, Jorma Markkula, Jouko Lumme, Timo Toikka, Markku Rantala, Heikki Anttila, Pentti Auer, Matti Pellonpää, Hanna Jokinen, Hannu Viholainen, Juuso Hirvikangas, Susanna Haavisto, Jaakko Talaskivi, Tarja Keinänen, Erkki Pajala, Eino Kuusela, Jyrki Olsonen, Marja Packalén, Reijo Marin, Sakari Kuosmanen, Olli Varja

favourite.title: Shadows in Paradise
favourite.overview: Nikander, a rubbish collector and would-be entrepreneur, finds his plans for success dashed when his business associate dies. One evening, he meets Ilona, a down-on-her-luck cashier, in a local supermarket. Falteringly, a bond begins to develop between them.
favourite.cast: Esko Nikkari, Mari Rantasila, Marina Martinoff, Jukka-Pekka Palo, Safka Pekkonen, Sakke Järvenpää, Matti Pellonpää, Jussi Tiitinen, Jukka Mäkinen, Kati Outinen, Erkki Rissanen, Mato Valtonen, Ulla Kuosmanen, Ari Korhonen, Pentti Koski, Eskil Mansikka, Sakari Kuosmanen, Bertta Pellonpää, Jaakko Talaskivi, Antti Ortamo, Riikka Kuosmanen, Malla Hukkanen, Sirkka Silin, Kylli Köngäs, Pekka Laiho, Neka Haapanen, Aki Kaurismäki, Helmeri Pellonpää, Olli Varja, Tanja Talaskivi, Svante Korkiakoski, Teuvo Rissanen, Haije Alanoja

favourite.title: A History of Violence
favourite.overview: An average family is thrust into the spotlight after the father commits a seemingly self-defense murder at his diner.

favourite.tagline: Tom Stall had the perfect life...until he became a hero.

favourite.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
favourite.overview: Captain Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.

visited.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
visited.overview: An assassin is shot by her ruthless employer, Bill, and other members of their assassination circle – but she lives to plot her vengeance.

visited.title: Jarhead
visited.overview: Jarhead is a film about a US Marine Anthony Swofford’s experience in the Gulf War. After putting up with an arduous boot camp, Swofford and his unit are sent to the Persian Gulf where they are eager to fight, but are forced to stay back from the action. Swofford struggles with the possibility of his girlfriend cheating on him, and as his mental state deteriorates, his desire to kill increases.
visited.cast: Chris Cooper, Damion Poitier, Peter Sarsgaard, Nick Dash, James Morrison, Brian Geraghty, John Krasinski, Ming Lo, Evan Jones, Becky Boxer, Dennis Haysbert, Laz Alonso, Jake Gyllenhaal, Jocko Sims, Brianne Davis, Todd Jensen, Jamie Foxx, Martin Papazian, Iván Fenyő, Scott MacDonald, Dendrie Taylor, Merik Tadros, Rini Bell, Kevin Foster, Craig Coyne, Katherine Randolph, Lucas Black, Mark Davis, Jacob Vargas, Riad Galayini, Kareem J. visited.writers: Anthony Swofford, Sam Chouia, William Broyles Jr.
